topic.title: General Medical Council List of Registered Medical Practitioners
topic.shortdesc: The General Medical Council List of Registered Medical Practitioners (LRMP) is a list of all doctors who are registered to practise in the UK (including GENERAL MEDICAL PRACTITIONERS).
